thread.section_title: Gamesdeal.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamesdeal.com | www.gamesdeal.com | 5 of 243
thread.title: Nicolai Enten Eller
thread.title_full: Gamesdeal.com reviewed by Nicolai Enten Eller

author: Nicolai Enten Eller
title: Nicolai Enten Eller
text:
Great service, fast delivery, fantastic customer support, and above all.. Those prices, wow!!
I have had my share of difficulties, end every time they have been sorted out in a hasty and friendly manner.
I am baffled by the bad reviews here, as those does not correlate with my experience, at all.
Save money, have fun.
